rules.description: CAPS_LOCK LAYER: caps_lock -> ctrl. Send escape when pressed alone [300ms] [no lotus]
HYPER LAYER: ctrl+<key> -> hyper(cmd+ctrl+shift+alt)+<key>. Send nothing when pressed alone [no lotus]
QUOTECTRL: quote -> ctrl. Send quote when pressed alone [300ms]
VIM insert mode [not kitty]: C-h=backspace, C-u=delete to beginning of line, C-w=delete prev word, C-l=canc
Mouse navigation: button4->back, button5->forward (all mouses. Must enable Device)
